about.subtitle: Get To Know
about.title: About Me
about.description: I am a full stack web developer with 4 years of experience, specializing in Front-End development with Angular, Vue, and React, as well as back-end development with Php/Symfony and Node.js/Express. I am passionate about creating innovative, performant, and scalable web applications.

services.subtitle: What I Offer
services.title: Services
services.front_end_skill_1: Design the structure and layout of the user interface
services.front_end_skill_2: Develop the user interface using markup languages such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
services.front_end_skill_3: Optimize the user interface for an efficient and user-friendly user experience
services.front_end_skill_4: Integrate libraries and frameworks such as Angular, Vue and React
services.front_end_skill_5: Perform compatibility tests with different browsers and screen resolutions
services.front_end_skill_6: Ensure consistency of the user interface with the brand identity
services.front_end_skill_7: Document design choices and features to facilitate future modifications
services.back_end_skill_1: Analyze the client's functional needs for application development
services.back_end_skill_2: Design the database structure to store application data
services.back_end_skill_3: Develop server-side functionality using programming languages such as PHP and Javascript with Node JS
services.back_end_skill_4: Ensure data security by implementing data protection measures and firewalls
services.back_end_skill_5: Perform performance testing to ensure the application is fast and responsive
services.back_end_skill_6: Deploy the application on an online server
services.back_end_skill_7: Document the application architecture to facilitate future modifications
services.project_management_skill_1: Plan and organize project tasks, including deadlines and required resources
services.project_management_skill_2: Establish a delivery schedule and milestones for the project
services.project_management_skill_3: Communicate with the client throughout the project to ensure satisfaction
services.project_management_skill_5: Ensure coordination between development team members and other stakeholders
services.project_management_skill_6: Monitor project progress and make adjustments as necessary
services.project_management_skill_7: Document the project to facilitate future maintenance and updates

background.subtitle: My Career Evolution
background.title: My Background
background.school_experience_description_1: Distance learning in web development to master the basics of HTML, CSS, and PHP languages.
background.work_experience_description_2: In an environment requiring PHP language, Wordpress CMS and agile methodology, I assisted developers with various tasks and meetings.
background.school_experience_description_3: Intensive in-person training. Study of all essential concepts for developing a web application using various technologies, starting from front-end, back-end, WordPress, and responsive web design.
background.diploma_experience_description_4: Obtaining of CNCP certifications in Web Integration Techniques No. 1447 & Web Development Techniques No. 1448 in web and mobile development (equivalent to a Bachelor's degree level).
background.school_experience_description_5: Remote training in Back-End to deepen current PHP skills in the areas of OOP and modeling, followed by learning the Symfony framework.
background.work_experience_description_6:
Developer role in the Web Factory team using Angular & Node.JS/Express to maintain and troubleshoot bugs & develop new features for the company's intranet CRM website. 
Development process based on AGILE methodology. In this context, my role was also to attend Daily Meetings, Sprint Planning, Sprint Review and Sprint Retrospective meetings to facilitate development and address various issues.
background.work_experience_description_7:
Web application development using Angular, Vue, React, PHP and Laravel technologies through multiple clients :
- Development of new features
- Maintenance and bug resolution
- Meeting requirements through mockups and technical specifications

contact.title: Contact Me

legal_notices.title: Legal notices and Privacy
legal_notices.title_description: In accordance with the provisions of law n° 2004-575 of June 21, 2004 for trust in the digital economy, users of the Ygraillot website are informed of the identity of the various parties involved in its creation and monitoring.
legal_notices.description_1: The present website, accessible at the URL ygraillot.com (the “Site”), is published by : Yanis Graillot
legal_notices.description_2:
The Site is hosted by Hostinger International LTD, located at 61 Lordou Vironos Street, 6023 Larnaca, Cyprus, (phone or email contact: https://www.hostinger.fr/contact).

This host currently holds personal information concerning the author of this site.
legal_notices.description_4: We are committed to protecting your privacy and complying with the rules on the protection of personal data, including the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).
legal_notices.subtitle_5: Collection and use of personal information
legal_notices.description_5:
We only collect personal information that you voluntarily provide to us via our contact form, which includes your name, email address, and message. We use this information to respond to your inquiries and to contact you if necessary.

We will never share your personal information with third parties without your explicit consent, except where required by law or where it is necessary to protect your vital interests.
legal_notices.description_6: We take reasonable security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, disclosure, modification, or destruction. We use standard security protocols to protect sensitive information transmitted over the internet.
legal_notices.description_7: You have the right to access your personal information that we have collected and to request that it be corrected, deleted, or restricted. You can also object to the use of your personal information for direct marketing purposes or request its portability.
legal_notices.description_8: We do not use cookies on our website.
legal_notices.description_9: We have not appointed a Data Protection Officer as we do not regularly process data on a large scale or collect sensitive data.
legal_notices.description_10: If you have any questions or concerns about our privacy policy or our use of your personal information, please contact us via our contact form.
